# Course Materials

## Textbook

The textbook is Garrett Grolemund and Hadley Wickham, _R for Data Science_. 

* the book, in its most up-to-date form, is freely available online at [r4ds.had.co.nz](https://r4ds.had.co.nz/)

* paperback and ebook version are available at the UVic Bookstore or other retailers



Samuel E. Buttrey and Lyn R. Whitaker, _A Data Scientist's Guide to Acquiring, Cleaning, and Managing Data in R_, Wiley, 2017

* [ebook through UVic library](https://learning-oreilly-com.ezproxy.library.uvic.ca/library/view/a-data-scientists/9781119080022/?ar?orpq&email=oJbr4Ho8VLXz0zbFzjLK2g%3d%3d&tstamp=1592592308&id=175D472B1E5E7B940BAC7864955E6D12F53E946C)


_Statistical Data Cleaning with Applications in R_, Wiley, 2018

* [ebook through UVic library](https://learning-oreilly-com.ezproxy.library.uvic.ca/library/view/statistical-data-cleaning/9781118897157/?ar?orpq&email=oJbr4Ho8VLXz0zbFzjLK2g%3d%3d&tstamp=1592592591&id=68FE450A07DAFB7CA03C510C6B5244B071582E5C)


## Additional Reading

Other resources&#8212;some required, some vital reference resources, and some optional "food for thought"&#8212;will be included in the  materials for each week's class. A cumulative resource list will be made available as part of this course site.
